name: Concentrated flow inputs
functionStatement: Quantity + quality of inflow (tributaries, ditches, and pipes) does not provide harmful peaks or pollution, and supports diverse habitat conditions.
descriptionMarkdown: Storm/tile drains, ditches are minimal or absent, preserving near-natural infiltration/runoff timing.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Count stormwater outfalls or ditches per 100 m using municipal layers or imagery and verify in the field where feasible.

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Outfalls or ditches per 100 m
Criteria: >5

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Outfalls or ditches per 100 m
Criteria: 4-5

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Outfalls or ditches per 100 m
Criteria: 2-3

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Outfalls or ditches per 100 m
Criteria: 0-1

references: Municipal MS4 outfall GIS layers (where available)
